availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Pope and Mary Pope. Married Nancy Elizabeth Whitten Pope in Carter County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1861. Father of Maggie Pope and Mary Pope. Resident of Carter County in 1850. Resident of Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 1, p. 265A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 258.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 6, p. 156B.
